飯椀: (めしわん) - bowl used for serving rice
飯櫃: (いいびつ) - round, wooden container for cooked rice
飯炊き: (めしたき) - cooking rice; kitchenmaid; cook
飯炊き女: (めしたきおんな) - female cook/kitchenmaid; woman who served both as a waitress and a prostitute in Osaka teahouses
飯盒: (はんごう) - (soldier's) cooking utensils/mess kit; outdoor (camping) cooking utensils
飯盛り女: (めしもりおんな) - maid at an inn who served clients and worked as a prostitute (Edo period)
飯盛女: (めしもりおんな) - maid at an inn who served clients and worked as a prostitute (Edo period)
飯碗: (めしわん) - bowl used for serving rice
飯粒: (めしつぶ) - grain of boiled rice
飯綱: (いづな) - a type of fox spirit
飯落ち: (めしおち) - dropping off-line to eat
飯蒸: (いいむし) - mochi rice topped with fish (or other food) and steamed
飯蒸し: (いいむし) - mochi rice topped with fish (or other food) and steamed
飲: (em/no) - drink , drinking (sometimes esp. alcohol), drink, drinking party
飲まず食わず: (のまずくわず) - (usu. ...で) without eating or drinking
飲ませる: (のませる) - to make somebody drink; to give someone a drink
飲まれる: (のまれる) - to be swallowed up/to be engulfed; to be overwhelmed/to be overawed
飲み: (nomi) - spigot, tap (em um barril, etc.); stock market bucketing , spigot, tap (in a cask, etc.); stock market bucketing; bookmaking
飲みあかす: (のみあかす) - to drink the night away
飲みかけ: (のみかけ) - partially consumed drink; partially consuming a drink
飲みかける: (のみかける) - to start to drink; to try to drink; to partially drink
飲みくだす: (のみくだす) - to swallow; to gulp down
飲みつぶす: (のみつぶす) - to drink away one's money; to be a sot
飲みつぶれる: (のみつぶれる) - to drink oneself drunk
飲みほす: (のみほす) - to drink up; to drain (cup)
飲みまわす: (のみまわす) - to pass the cup round
飲みまわる: (のみまわる) - to go on a pub-crawl; to drink at a round of places
飲みやすい: (のみやすい) - easy to drink; easy to swallow; quaffable
飲みニケーション: (のみニケーション) - (from 飲み and コミュニケーション)  communicating while drinking (usu. with colleagues); communicating through drinking together; boozing with work people
飲みニュケーション: (のみニュケーション) - (from 飲み and コミュニケーション)  communicating while drinking (usu. with colleagues); communicating through drinking together; boozing with work people
飲み下す: (のみくだす) - to swallow; to gulp down
飲み乾す: (のみほす) - to drink up; to drain (cup)
飲み付ける: (のみつける) - to drink regularly; to drink stubbornly
飲み代: (のみしろ) - drink money; drinking money
飲み倒す: (のみたおす) - to skip out on one's bar bill
飲み助: (のみすけ) - tippler; drunkard; heavy drinker
飲み口: (のみぐち) - (usu. のみくち) taste (of a liquid, esp. alcoholic beverages); someone who enjoys alcohol; place one's lips touch on the rim of a cup; shape of one's mouth when drinking; (usu. のみぐち) tap/faucet/spigot
飲み合せ: (のみあわせ) - taking multiple medications; taking medicine and certain foods together or in close proximity (which should be avoided)
飲み合わせ: (のみあわせ) - taking multiple medications; taking medicine and certain foods together or in close proximity (which should be avoided)
飲み回し: (のみまわし) - passing the bottle around
飲み回す: (のみまわす) - to pass the cup round
飲み回る: (のみまわる) - to go on a pub-crawl; to drink at a round of places
飲み始める: (のみはじめる) - to begin to drink
飲み干す: (のみほす) - to drink up; to drain (cup)
飲み掛け: (のみかけ) - partially consumed drink; partially consuming a drink
飲み掛ける: (のみかける) - to start to drink; to try to drink; to partially drink
飲み放題: (のみほうだい) - all you can drink; bottomless cup
飲み料: (のみりょう) - one's (portion of a) drink
飲み方: (のみかた) - way of taking (a pill); way of drinking
飲み明かす: (のみあかす) - to drink the night away
飲み易い: (のみやすい) - easy to drink; easy to swallow; quaffable
飲み止す: (のみさす) - to stop drinking; to leave unfinished
飲み歩く: (のみあるく) - to go bar-hopping; to go on a pub crawl
飲み水: (のみみず) - drinking water; potable water
飲み潰す: (のみつぶす) - to drink away one's money; to be a sot
飲み潰れる: (のみつぶれる) - to drink oneself drunk
飲み薬: (のみぐすり) - oral medicine; internal medicine
飲み込む: (のみこむ) - to gulp down/to swallow deeply; to understand/to take in/to catch on to/to learn/to digest; to engulf/to swallow up; to be filled with (people)/to be crowded; to hold back from saying something/to swallow (one's words)
飲み逃げ: (のみにげ) - leaving drinks unpaid for
飲み過ぎる: (のみすぎる) - to drink too much
飲み食い: (のみくい) - food and drink; eating and drinking
飲む: (nomu) - beber, engolir, tomar (medicina); fumar (tabaco); engolir, dominar; conter, suprimir
飲むべ: (のむべ) - person who likes to drink
飲む打つ買う: (のむうつかう) - drinking, gambling, and buying women in prostitution
飲める: (のめる) - to be able to drink; to be worth drinking
飲んだくれる: (のんだくれる) - to get dead drunk

飲乾す: (のみほす) - to drink up; to drain (cup)
飲付ける: (のみつける) - to drink regularly; to drink stubbornly

飲倒す: (のみたおす) - to skip out on one's bar bill
飲助: (のみすけ) - tippler; drunkard; heavy drinker
飲口: (のみぐち) - (usu. のみくち) taste (of a liquid, esp. alcoholic beverages); someone who enjoys alcohol; place one's lips touch on the rim of a cup; shape of one's mouth when drinking; (usu. のみぐち) tap/faucet/spigot
飲合せ: (のみあわせ) - taking multiple medications; taking medicine and certain foods together or in close proximity (which should be avoided)
